<h2>Who are we?</h2>

[HostWithLinux](https://hostwithlinux.net) is a UK based web host, providing budget cPanel and VPS hosting since 2012. We offer support through ticket, live chat and email. Our latest offer is our USA based reseller hosting located in Los Angeles in the Quadranet datacenter on duel Xeon servers.

<h2>Plans</h2>

[**$4/Month USA cPanel Reseller Hosting - Click here to order**](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/order.php?step=1&productGroup=1&product=45)

* 50GB Disk Spae
* 2TB Bandwidth on a shared gigabit port
* Unlimited cPanel Accounts
* Unlimited Domains/Mail/Features

<h2>What else do we offer?</h2>

* Premium Softaculous apps installer
* Whitelabel cPanel login URL
* cPanel Cloudflare plugin
* Low number of accounts per server
* Free account migration
* Apache 2.4 with PHP 5.4
* MySQL, MySQLi and PostgreSQL
* Ioncube/ZendGuard extensions
* PHP Caching with XCache
* Mod Security with domain control
* AWStats, Webalizer and Analog stats
* 100% uptime guarantee

<h2>Support</h2>

Feel free to [PM me](http://lowendtalk.com/messages/add/linuxthefish), [create a support ticket](https://billing.hostwithlinux.net/index.php?fuse=support&controller=ticket&view=submitticket) or send an email to support(at)hostwithlinux.net if you have any questions, queries or worries.

Please make sure to read our [terms of service](https://hostwithlinux.net/tos.html) before you order, and dedicated IP's can be bought for $1 per month with justification. Thank you for your time, we hope you choose us for your reseller hosting needs!
